articles.title: A Supercomputer Predicts When Humanity Will Go Extinct—Scientists Have Already Pinpointed the Date - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: A supercomputer simulation has mapped out Earth's distant future, revealing a world where survival may no longer be possible. Rising temperatures, volcanic chaos, and an unrecognizable climate could push mammals—including humans—to the edge. Scientists have t…
articles.content:
A new supercomputer simulation has given scientists a glimpse into Earths distant futurea world where a superheated supercontinent could drive mammals, including humans, to extinction.
The research,… [+5613 chars]
